name: Zuzu Block Party
locationDisplayName: in the Zuzu City Bus Stop Area
DTZ.DowntownZuzuCP_David: How's it going, @?$h#$b#Don't the burgers smell delicious?$l

Haley_spouse: Hey, @!$h#$b#I love coming to the Zuzu Block Party every year.$h#$b#I always get great photos!$l
Emily: Hey, @. The energy at this festival is great.$h#$b#I come here every year with Sandy, she likes visiting Zuzu City.
Emily_spouse: Hello, @! The energy at this festival is great, but it's even better now that you're here!$h#$b#I come here every year with Sandy, she likes visiting Zuzu City.
Sandy: @!$h#$b#What a nice surprise!$h#$b#I love coming to Zuzu City when the shop isn't busy. This party just makes it even better!$h

DTZ.DowntownZuzuCP_Kristoff_spouse: Hello, my love! I hope you're enjoying the party!$l#$b#I helped fund it.$h
DTZ.DowntownZuzuCP_Sadie: Hey, @. How's it going? I took a day off from flying to come here!$h#$b#Tourists come from all around for this party, you know.
DTZ.DowntownZuzuCP_Sadie_spouse: Hey, baby. How's it going? I'm glad we can still come to festivals like this in the city together.$l#$b#Tourists come from all around for this party, you know.$h
DTZ.DowntownZuzuCP_Buddy: Good afternoon, @.#$b#Nice day for a festival.$h
DTZ.DowntownZuzuCP_Max: @!$h#$b#I hope you're enjoying the festivities as much as I am!#$e#I've never seen Kristoff so joyous...$h
DTZ.DowntownZuzuCP_Hazel: The food is... not bad!$h#$b#They should've got Uncle Gio to handle the catering, though...
DTZ.DowntownZuzuCP_Selena: The Zuzu Block Party has been around for years now.$h#$e#Are you having as much fun as our ancestors?$h
DTZ.DowntownZuzuCP_Selena_spouse: The Zuzu Block Party has been around for years now, love.$h#$e#Are you having as much fun as our ancestors would've?$h
DTZ.DowntownZuzuCP_Giovanni: Well, hello, @!$h#$b#I hope you're having a wonderful time!$h#$e#That man on the grill isn't as good as me...$s#$b#Nothing beats Giovanni's signature sauce!$h
MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren: Hey! Make sure you grab some grub, because I think at the rate I'm going I'll beat my own personal record for number of hot dogs eaten in one day.$1#$b#Wouldn't want you to miss out just because I turn into a bottomless pit at these things.$3
